name: ShipBob
headline: Providing Amazon level logistics to e-commerce businesses.
description: ShipBob is a leading global fulfillment and supply chain platform designed for SMB and Mid-Market ecommerce brands. ShipBob provides brands a single view of their business and customers across sales channels to manage products, inventory, orders, and shipments, leveraging real-time analytics and reporting, dedicated support, and access to hundreds of technology and retail partners. ShipBob enables brands to improve the operations in their own facilities with ShipBob WMS (ShipBob's proprietary warehouse management system), and/or outsource fulfillment to have their orders picked, packed, and shipped from any of ShipBob’s 50+ fulfillment centers across the United States, Canada, Europe, and Australia. Founded in 2014, ShipBob launched through Y Combinator by co-founders Dhruv Saxena and Divey Gulati, two ecommerce entrepreneurs who saw a need for more efficient SMB supply chain services. Learn more by visiting shipbob.com.

# **The #1 ecommerce fulfillment solution**
  * **Order fulfillment services.** Warehousing, packing, shipping, tracking, and returns. 2-day shipping. Custom packaging.
  * **Inventory management.** Single source of truth across fulfillment centers. Track in real time. Know when to restock.
  * **Omnichannel.** Integrate with all major ecommerce platforms and marketplaces. Shopify, Amazon, TikTok, and 100+ retailers.

[Get a Quote](http://shipbob.com/</quote>)
![Image Media](https://www.shipbob.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/911af7aa209e00b49f3d6fd2afa92564.jpg)
### **99.8%**
**Of orders ship on time**
within SLA
### **99.95%**
**Accuracy rate**
in fulfilling orders
### ****50** +**
Fulfillment centers
across 6 countries
### **#1**
**Best Overall Fulfillment Solution of 2024**
by Retail Tech Breakthrough
###### You’re in good hands

[Our Customers](http://shipbob.com/</blog/category/case-studies/>)

###### ECOMMERCE FULFILLMENT solutions
## ShipBob is an end-to-end fulfillment provider
![Image Media](https://www.shipbob.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/14003308f2bae5d8809dc2c8facd9b9d.svg)Inventory distributionPlace inventory across different US regions via one hub, with automated replenishment.
![Image Media](https://www.shipbob.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/3c5e2d0e5c7677643fc0807fcf2b5e8b.svg)Order fulfillmentGet best-in-class picking, packing, shipping, returns, and more across 50+ fulfillment centers.
![Image Media](https://www.shipbob.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/bfea635b292017e2ece2b2dfdf8f3e12.svg)2-day shippingOffer 2-day shipping for all sales channels across the continental US.
![Image Media](https://www.shipbob.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/6e897a380658d8bcaeb45bb3ec336868.svg)Customized unboxingsPlace inventory across different US regions via one hub, with automated replenishment.
![Image Media](https://www.shipbob.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/5d723db019cdcfc2c174abc7a1707596.svg)Warehouse managementTrack inventory across warehouses in real time. Monitor stock levels. Reorder alerts.
![Image Media](https://www.shipbob.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/875a17ab7cb2afd1ac99ec61b586a6d5.svg)Global fulfillmentShip to 250+ destinations, with standard and expedited shipping options.
![Image Media](https://www.shipbob.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/32045388caf6e1a09c005e99943a08d0.svg)Global expansionLeverage one partner to scale across the world for an optimized supply chain.
![Image Media](https://www.shipbob.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/48f93226bd4bf7e47c8b12406037cd36.svg)B2B fulfillmentConnect to retailers for automated EDI wholesale and retail fulfillment.
![Image Media](https://www.shipbob.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/e874fea6533d34d38af5ea24f6ab659f.svg)IntegrationsFulfill orders from all ecommerce platforms, marketplaces, retailers, and social channels.
## **How Our Place Saved $1.5 Million on Shipping While Cutting Delivery Times in Half With ShipBob**
###### **STREAMLINED FULFILLMENT**
## How it works
**From your online store to your customer’s door**
![Image Media](https://www.shipbob.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/home-sec1-1.svg)
###  Step One
Connect your store and sync your products in a couple clicks.
![Image Media](https://www.shipbob.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/home-sec1-2.svg)
### Step two
Send us your inventory, and we’ll help distribute it to your needs.
![Image Media](https://www.shipbob.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/home-sec1-3.svg)
### Step three
Relax as we handle picking, packing, and shipping for you!

###### **CUSTOMER STORIES**
## ShipBob is a partner for the long run — at all stages of growth
![Image Media](https://www.shipbob.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/ed145c852edd364485e01e1a1db4eae6.png)
## 2,400
SKUs in their catalog
> "We have a high item per order ratio, The ability to have variable costs and competitive pricing for shipping is important to us. We have days with over 1,000 orders and it’s not problem for ShipBob."
> **John Lewis** , President and COO of [Vision Investments](http://shipbob.com/<https:/www.shipbob.com/blog/autogeek/>)
![Image Media](https://www.shipbob.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/Series-E-Funding-4.png)
## 10s of 1,000s
of orders fulfilled per drop
> "As we saw our business beginning to gain traction, we needed to find a fulfillment partner that could help us manage the 1000s of orders we would get in minutes. We found exactly that with ShipBob."
> **Jason Ton** , CFO of [100 Thieves](http://shipbob.com/<https:/www.shipbob.com/blog/100-thieves/>)
![Image Media](https://www.shipbob.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/0b5ea42e124f687284c6d5b88f56b6c0.jpg)
## $1.5M
in cost savings
> Expanding our warehouse network from 2 to 4 warehouses has translated into $1.5 million in freight cost savings for Our Place. It also cut our fulfillment and shipping times in half, from 5 or 6 days to just 2.5 days.
> **Ali Shahid** , COO of [Our Place](http://shipbob.com/<https:/www.shipbob.com/blog/our-place/>)
![Image Media](https://www.shipbob.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Touchland-hand-sanitizer.png)
## 1,200%
growth in a couple of weeks
> "ShipBob’s speed to scale and fast pick, pack, and ship process has been seamless, as our business grew 1,200% in 2 weeks. They’ve been a great ally, facilitating a 2-3 day delivery time in the US."
> **Andrea Lisbona** , Founder & CEO [Touchland](http://shipbob.com/<https:/www.shipbob.com/blog/touchland/>)
[Read More Customer Stories](http://shipbob.com/</blog/category/case-studies/>)
## **Ship from 50+ global locations**
We use our network of fulfillment centers to help you strategically split and manage your inventory to reduce shipping costs and transit times.
[Speak to a Fulfilment Expert](http://shipbob.com/</quote>)

# **The #1 ecommerce fulfillment solution**
  * **Order fulfillment services.** Warehousing, packing, shipping, tracking, and returns. 2-day shipping. Custom packaging.
  * **Inventory management.** Single source of truth across fulfillment centers. Track in real time. Know when to restock.
  * **Omnichannel.** Integrate with all major ecommerce platforms and marketplaces. Shopify, Amazon, TikTok, and 100+ retailers.

## ShipBob is an end-to-end fulfillment provider
![Image Media⟨47⟩]Inventory distributionPlace inventory across different US regions via one hub, with automated replenishment.
![Image Media⟨48⟩]Order fulfillmentGet best-in-class picking, packing, shipping, returns, and more across 50+ fulfillment centers.
![Image Media⟨49⟩]2-day shippingOffer 2-day shipping for all sales channels across the continental US.
![Image Media⟨50⟩]Customized unboxingsPlace inventory across different US regions via one hub, with automated replenishment.
![Image Media⟨51⟩]Warehouse managementTrack inventory across warehouses in real time. Monitor stock levels. Reorder alerts.

![Image Media⟨53⟩]Global expansionLeverage one partner to scale across the world for an optimized supply chain.

![Image Media⟨55⟩]IntegrationsFulfill orders from all ecommerce platforms, marketplaces, retailers, and social channels.

generated_description:
**ShipBob: Revolutionizing E-commerce Fulfillment**

Founded in 2014 in Chicago and launched through Y Combinator, ShipBob is on a mission to provide Amazon-level logistics to small to mid-sized e-commerce businesses. Co-founders Dhruv Saxena and Divey Gulati, both seasoned e-commerce entrepreneurs, created ShipBob to address the inefficient supply chain services faced by SMBs. Today, ShipBob stands as a leading global fulfillment and supply chain platform, enabling e-commerce brands to streamline their operations across sales channels.

### What ShipBob Does

At its core, ShipBob offers a comprehensive fulfillment solution that aims to simplify the logistics process for e-commerce businesses. The platform provides a single view of inventory, orders, and shipments, supported by real-time analytics. Brands can opt to fulfill orders using ShipBob’s proprietary Warehouse Management System (WMS) in-house, or they can delegate their fulfillment to any of ShipBob’s 50+ fulfillment centers located across the U.S., Canada, Europe, and Australia.

Here are some key services ShipBob provides:
- **Outsourced Fulfillment**: Pick, pack, and ship services designed to scale with your business needs.
- **Inventory Management**: Tools to automate distribution, allowing for optimized stock levels and quick replenishment.
- **Global Expansion**: Support for brands looking to scale their market presence worldwide.
- **2-Day Shipping**: An effective way to drive revenue and meet customer expectations for quick deliveries.
- **Omnichannel Fulfillment**: Seamlessly integrate sales across various online and in-person platforms including Shopify, Amazon, and more.

### Results That Speak Volumes

ShipBob has proven successful by partnering with a range of customers from various industries, including health, beauty, food & beverage, and apparel. They boast impressive metrics:
- 99.8% of orders shipped on time.
- A 99.95% accuracy rate in fulfillment.

Their model is built for both simplicity and efficiency; inventory can be distributed across fulfillment centers to reduce shipping costs and transit times, setting them apart in a crowded e-commerce landscape.

### Notable Achievements

ShipBob’s innovative approach has garnered recognition, including being named the "#1 Best Overall Fulfillment Solution of 2024" by Retail Tech Breakthrough. Their growth speaks for itself: significant savings and enhanced operational capabilities for their clients, like Our Place, which saved $1.5 million on shipping while halving delivery times.

If you’re in the e-commerce space and feeling bogged down by logistics, ShipBob may just be the partner you need to scale efficiently and effectively. For more information, visit [shipbob.com](http://shipbob.com).
